lineage.Process: CalculateField tza_pop_adm3_wards_census2012_NBS_MapAction_OCHA SOURCE "Ward shape from Tanzania National Bureau of Statistics website (http://www.nbs.go.tz/) Census 2012 data, joined to the Census 2012 population table by ward from Map Action, by UN OCHA ROSA" VB #

descript.abstract: Tanzania Administrative Boundaries Level 3 (Wards) shapefile downloaded from TNBS (Tanzania National Bureau of Statistics) website (http://www.nbs.go.tz/) and joined to the Census 2012 population table by ward from Map Action, by UN OCHA ROSA. (Wards do not nest exactly with Administrative Boundaries Level I & II. Topology has not been validated)"
